title: Dependent Care Savings Account Act of 2014
content: Dependent Care Savings Account Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish tax-exempt dependent care savings accounts to pay the employment-related expenses of caring for a dependent of the taxpayer, (2) allow a deduction from gross income of up to $5,000 in a taxable year for cash contributions to such accounts, (3) set forth rules for the tax treatment ofnbsp. Account distributions and for excess contributions to an account, and (4) impose a tax on employers who fail to makenbsp. Comparable contributions to a dependent savings account for all participating employees.
